name: Roasted Maple Garlic Cloves
description: Garlic is a powerful antioxidant, boosting the immune system.
preparation: Trim top and bottom of garlic bulbs and place in a mini baker.
Drizzle with oil and add Maple Bacon Sea Salt and Maple Bacon Pepper to taste. Cover and bake for 30–40 minutes, or until garlic is soft and tender.
When cooled, gently squeeze each clove to extract garlic.
tips: Serving suggestions:  Spread on crackers or toasted French baguette rounds  Mash with Epicure Pesto Sauce Mix for a delicious spread  Add to mashed potatoes  Mix with butter for great garlic bread  Insert under chicken skin before roasting
